remarks: Lemma for the Axiom of Replacement with no distinct variable conditions.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Jan-2002.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 6-Dec-2016.)
statement: axrepndlem2 $p |- ( ( ( -. A. x x = y /\ -. A. x x = z ) /\ -. A. y y = z ) -> E. x ( E. y A. z ( ph -> z = y ) -> A. z ( z e. x <-> E. x ( x e. y /\ A. y ph ) ) ) ) $.
